channel.title: E3 2011
channel.description:
That's right. It's the catch-all E3 thread. Post all the orgasmic video game news you can handle over the next few days! Until the show starts, though. Predictions! Let's hear them.
Also, live stream link for your pleasure: [url]https://e3.gamespot.com/live.html[/url]

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
TheSuperNova:

Lol, I never meant to sound like a fan-boy, I was simply stating an opinion. and please, I’m not an idiot. So don’t go making accusations without a real reason.

calm down much?

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: TheSuperNova
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Neither it was a big deal for me. Like I said, I just noticed it and thought it was funny how close the design was to quake 4.

Not my fault if some fanboy takes it too seriously and flips out.

Lol, I never meant to sound like a fan-boy, I was simply stating an opinion. and please, I’m not an idiot. So don’t go making accusations without a real reason.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Luciel:

I´m agreeing with you in the fact of the similarities, but I just don´t think it´s that big of a deal, hell I wouldn´t be surprised if they didn´t even realise it looked like a Q4 monster when they where designing it.

Neither it was a big deal for me. Like I said, I just noticed it and thought it was funny how close the design was to quake 4.

Not my fault if some fanboy takes it too seriously and flips out.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

If it wasn’t for his inadequate reaction and himself acting like an idiot further along the way, it would stay as a 1 post jab.
I wasn’t complaining, I wasn’t dissing - I merely posted what I noticed - it was just so painfully obvious, since half of Q4 you were fighting stitched up gray fatsos with guns instead of arms.

I´m agreeing with you in the fact of the similarities, but I just don´t think it´s that big of a deal, hell I wouldn´t be surprised if they didn´t even realise it looked like a Q4 monster when they where designing it.

By the way, does anyone know what graphic engine is SS3 using?

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
Whatever.

Serious Sam has always been a pistake of shoot em up games, that´s the whole point of the game, tbh it doesn´t really bother me that there´s a strogg in the game (just I agree it´s similar), hell it just adds more fun to it.

To me that kind of comment just sounds like the kids who whine about everything being a copy of halo.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
As i previously said, the game is inspired by quake and similar run and gun shooters

so nowadays copying monster designs from = inspired by? Seriously (no pun intended), Serious Sam always had very original designs, despite ‘being inspired by ~~’… What this idtech4-era strogg is doing in SS is beyond me.
But I really don’t understand why are you getting so worked up about this.
Oh I get it, judging from your sig, I landed an insult on your favorite game. Too fucking bad.

you act like a complete tool on these forums, which is nothing short of the truth.

I guess you’ll have to live with it

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: TheSuperNova
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Newfags can be so clueless and funny.
Why do you you take yourself so seriously and why do you think you know me.

But srsly, go on, tell me it’s not one of the q4 stroggs

As i previously said, the game is inspired by quake and similar run and gun shooters. I never said i know you, But i implied you act like a complete tool on these forums, which is nothing short of the truth.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: TheKeeper
item.description:
Mirror’s edge 2 still in development!? WAH!? There is a god. And his name os Frank Gibeau.

https://www.examiner.com/playstation-in-national/e3-mirror-s-edge-2-still-development-could-use-frostbite-2-as-engine

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: TheSuperNova
item.description:
Luciel:

They where pretty cartoony

Maybe the graphical style had a slight cartoon edge to it, but I never felt the game it’s self was really cartoony, just looks at serious sam 2, for instance, then you will see how cartoony it is compared to the first and second encounter, but I’m glad Serious Sam 3 will have a more serious, but still old school feel to it.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
They where pretty cartoony

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: TheSuperNova
item.description:
Luciel:

No, he doesn´t.

But yeah I´m looking forward to SS, loved the first one when it came out, used to coop all the time with my school/college mates. Liked the “second episode” but could never get into SS2.

Also, is it me or while SS3 graphics look awesome, they don´t look cartoony like we´ve come to expect from an SS game?

Yeah, the devs said they were dropping the cartoony style seen in the previous serious sam 2 game, but the first and second encounter weren’t cartoony really

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: Shinobi
item.description:
I am looking forward to the new SSX game. I played SSx tricky and really liked it, but what I feel it lacked was prettiness. I prefer cross country over trick heavy riding and just enjoying the scenery. The new one is shaping up to be really pretty.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
av3nger:

Serious sam. Let’s not get lazy with the acronyms on every game. Hell, not that long ago people used to spell out everything on the internet, jesus it was better back then. No faggot Cod fans in the masses, or anything else either. Just people doing their thing and being friendly. Now you’ve got texting and everyone brings their terrible texting grammar to the internet scene. Hah, BlackMesaSource.com doesn’t even realize the word “texting”. One point there.

Just saying: Serious Sam: The First Encounter and Serious Sam: The Second Encounter were the shit.

Call Of Duty

Let´s not get lazy with the acronyms :pirate:

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: av3nger
item.description:
Bloodshot:

Really? I thought there was more from Doom 3, what with one looking like a CyberDemon/Hellknight combined, and the other looking exactly like a Mancubus.

Personally, I never cared for the SS series. Found most of the games to be entertaining for all of 5 minutes.

Serious sam. Let’s not get lazy with the acronyms on every game. Hell, not that long ago people used to spell out everything on the internet, jesus it was better back then. No faggot Cod fans in the masses, or anything else either. Just people doing their thing and being friendly. Now you’ve got texting and everyone brings their terrible texting grammar to the internet scene. Hah, BlackMesaSource.com doesn’t even realize the word “texting”. One point there.

Just saying: Serious Sam: The First Encounter and Serious Sam: The Second Encounter were the shit.

Read full topic

Personally, I never cared for the SS series. Found most of the games to be entertaining for all of 5 minutes.

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: TheSuperNova
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

And time has come when Serious Sam started to copy designs from q4.

Do you ever have anything constructive to say? all of the posts you make are either you trolling people to shit. or arguing over something. lol

Where are the similarities you’re referring to anyway? I’m not trying to sound like a mega fan-boy. but i respect the games for there true to the roots style and not worrying about any sort of realism. The games are supposed to be in the same sort of run and gun style of Quake, so obviously there will be some inspiration/ design similarities, but i didn’t notice any from the short video.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
gibbelin:

Serious Sam 3 does look pretty cool, but I wish people would stop calling it SS3. Every time I see that my brain goes “Holy shit System Shock 3!”

Supposedly EA’s owned the rights for some time.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2011
item.dc:creator: TheSuperNova
item.description:
Dotard:

This too … SS3 have even better graphics its really interesting that even 6 years old hardware is able to render that … sure PC versions(if there will be any)will look much better but try to imagine what games will look like with next generation of consoles, PC hardware will be allowed to move forward much faster with that so Im awaiting close to CGI quality on PC with next generation of consoles.
But maybe Im expecting too much

This game is exclusive to PC (at the moment) but yeah the graphics are pretty nice.

Read full topic
